ojvm.machine
Class ControlUnit

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ojvm.machine.ControlUnit
public class ControlUnit
extends java.lang.Object

A control unit for the machine that allows convenient access to the internals of the machine and the global operations that use and affect the state of the machine. File created June 13, 2000
